title: DAMIEN
role: The children take their seats for another day of school.

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman is passing out envelopes to all the kids.

title: DAMIEN
text: Here you go, Kyle. And here's yours Stan...

title: DAMIEN
text: (Opening the envelope) What is this, Cartman?

title: DAMIEN
text: They're invitations to my birthday party this weekend.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, Sweet! Your mom is giving you a big party again this year?

title: DAMIEN
text: Thaaaat's right! (Singing) 'Cause it's my birthday! My Bu-Bu Birthdayyy!

title: DAMIEN
text: Kick ass, dude. Cartman's mom throws the best birthday parties ever!

title: DAMIEN
text: That's right!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, if MY mom could cook like Cartman's mom, I'd be a big fat ass too.

title: DAMIEN
text: That's right! (Catching himself) HEY!

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh Eric, I didn't get an invitation.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh really? Gosh, where could I have put Pip's invitation?

title: DAMIEN
text: Let's see... Pip's invitation... Pip's invitation... OH, I REMEMBER!

title: DAMIEN
text: I shoved it up my ass!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yes that's right, I wrote it out, put it in a envelope, sealed it, and then PLOOP! Shoved it right my ass, forever ruining any chance you had of coming to my birthday party. Sorry, Pip ol' chap.

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman walks past Pip and hands out more invites.

title: DAMIEN
text: Here's yours Wendy, and here's yours Clyde...

title: DAMIEN
text: Children, children... Today is a very special day --

title: DAMIEN
text: No, my birthday isn't until Saturday.

title: DAMIEN
text: I'm not talking about your birthday, Eric. We have a new student joining our class today!

title: DAMIEN
text: Now, some of you know what it's like to be the new kid in town. So I want you all to take special care to make him feel welcome.

title: DAMIEN
role: An odd-looking child wearing all black steps up next to Mr.
text: Garrison.

title: DAMIEN
text: I want you all to meet our new classmate... Uh... What's your name again?

title: DAMIEN
text: Damien.

title: DAMIEN
role: CLOSE UP on Damien's eyes. Demonic music plays.

title: DAMIEN
text: Say hi to Damien!

title: DAMIEN
text: And where are you from, Damien?

title: DAMIEN
text: The seventh layer of hell.

title: DAMIEN
text: Ooh, that's exciting. My mother was from Alabama.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien stands up on a chair.

title: DAMIEN
text: My arrival connotes the end of the beginning the beginning of the end! The new reign of my father!

title: DAMIEN
text: Your father?

title: DAMIEN
text: The Prince of Darkness!

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow, we have royalty in our class! Why don't you take your seat, Damien, we're going to finish our lesson on great singers of the Baroque Era.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien gets down from the chair and sits next to Cartman.

title: DAMIEN
text: Now children, Nancy Sinatra was quite a choice piece of ass...

title: DAMIEN
role: As Garrison continues, Cartman leans over to Damien.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey new kid, do you want an invitation to my birthday party?

title: DAMIEN
text: Here begins the rule of pain. The new domination of --

title: DAMIEN
text: PSYCHE!! I wasn't gonna GIVE you an invitation!! HA, HA!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey, who cut your hair? Stevie Wonder?

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien turns his head to one side. CHOIR MUSIC kicks in as
text: Cartman's desk goes flying up into the air and out the window.

title: DAMIEN
text: Woa, dude!

title: DAMIEN
text: Damn! What a FREAK!

title: DAMIEN
text: HEY! I had a poofie pie in that desk.

title: DAMIEN
text: NOW FEEL THE WRATH OF THE FALLEN ANGEL!! THE PLAGUE OF NIGHT IS UPON THE!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Damien, do you need to sit in time out for a few minutes?

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien looks around, confused. Then he steps down from his
text: desk and sits calmly.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Singing) You got in trou-ble! You got in trou- ble!

title: DAMIEN
role: The boys are eating lunch. Stan is reading from an envelope.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey Cartman, how come the birthday invitation you gave me says 'Green Mega Man'?

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, mine says 'Red Mega-Man'.

title: DAMIEN
text: Right. That's what you're supposed to get me for my birthday.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan and Kyle look at each other.

title: DAMIEN
text: Dude! You're not supposed to TELL people what to get you for your birthday!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, that's weak!

title: DAMIEN
text: Look, it's very simple, guys. Green Mega Man goes with Red Mega-Man and Yellow Mega-Man to make the Ultra- Mega-Mega-Man. You have to have all three or doesn't work, see?

title: DAMIEN
text: Up yours, Cartman. I'll get you whatever the hell I want!

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh! So maybe you don't want to have any of my mom's cake pie and ice cream then!

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, Green Mega-Man it is.

title: DAMIEN
text: Now, as you can see, Kenny, YOU are to get me Yellow Mega-Man. That's because yellow Mega-Man is the cheapest one, and I know how poor your family is...

title: DAMIEN
role: Just then, Damien sits down with his lunch tray. The boys
text: all looked shocked.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey, what do you think you're doing, new kid?

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, you can't sit with us, weirdo!

title: DAMIEN
text: INFIDELS! I will turn you all into beasts of burden!!

title: DAMIEN
text: You can't sit with us new kid! Go find another table!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Anyway, Kenny, yellow Mega-Man is only $8.95, so maybe your mom can put it on layaway and make payments for a year or two.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan and Kyle laugh. Kenny punches Cartman.

title: DAMIEN
role: As Cartman continues, Damien sits at a table that is empty
text: except for Pip.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, good day, Damien! My name is Phillip, but everyone calls me 'Pip'... Because they hate me.

title: DAMIEN
text: Then I will call you PIP.

title: DAMIEN
text: Right-o.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan calls over from his table --

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey new kid!

title: DAMIEN
text: Kenny says he saw your mom drop you off this morning, and she's a REAL DOG!

title: DAMIEN
role: The boys all laugh. Damien scowls.

title: DAMIEN
text: Mph rmph rm rmph rm!

title: DAMIEN
role: The boys laugh even harder. Damien gets pissed. He cringes
text: his brow. More CHOIR music jumps in.

title: DAMIEN
text: THAT DOES IT!! OOF-FAAA!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Kenny shivers and shakes and then suddenly -- PWOOF! Kenny
text: is turned into a duck billed platypus. (Still wearing his little orange coat.)

title: DAMIEN
text: What the --

title: DAMIEN
text: Dude! He turned Kenny into a duck billed platypus!

title: DAMIEN
text: A what?

title: DAMIEN
text: Wack, wack.

title: DAMIEN
text: HEY!! Turn him back you butthole!! He has to buy me the yellow Mega- Man!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Hello there, children!

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey, Chef.

title: DAMIEN
text: How's it going?

title: DAMIEN
text: Bad.

title: DAMIEN
text: Why bad?

title: DAMIEN
text: Chef, there's a new kid in school, and he's a total weird-o freak.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh children, children, you shouldn't not like somebody just because they're different. Here, let me sing you a little song...

title: DAMIEN
text: (Singing) We're all special, in our own way Everybody's different but that's okay 'Cause even though we might have different color skin, different points of views, be tall or thin -- It doesn't mean I can't lay you down, woman and touch your silky skin -- Put my love deep inside you where no man has ever been -- Rub your legs, caress your thighs and....

title: DAMIEN
text: What were we talking about again?

title: DAMIEN
text: (Pointing) The new kid.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien is now standing on the lunch table with his arms
text: raised.

title: DAMIEN
text: Death to the holy! The wrath of the fallen angel now makes for you all!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien throws his hands in the air and tables go flying
text: everywhere. Blood starts dripping from the ceiling.

title: DAMIEN
text: WHOA!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: The cafeteria is like the eye of a hurricane.

title: DAMIEN
text: Ooh, that is one futched up little cracker!!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: We told you, dude!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien continues to throw his hands up in the air. Shit
text: continues to fly everywhere.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Shouting) We've got to do something, children! He's tearing my cafeteria apart!!

title: DAMIEN
text: BRING ME JESUS!! MY WRATH SHALL CONTINUE UNTIL I SPEAK WITH JESUS!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan and Kyle look at each other.

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus?

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus is sitting at a make-up table brushing his hair.

title: DAMIEN
text: Two minutes to air, Jesus.

title: DAMIEN
text: Thanks, Roland. Blessed art Thou.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan and Kyle charge into the dressing room.

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus, Jesus!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Hi kids, I only do autographs after the show.

title: DAMIEN
text: No, no, there's a big problem at school! Some new kid showed up wearing all black and Chef thinks he's evil.

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, look what he did to our friend Kenny.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wack, wack.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow... That's pretty heavy.

title: DAMIEN
text: This new kid keeps throwing things around and saying stuff about his Dark Prince Father coming. He said he wants to talk to you.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Standing) The Dark Prince?

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah.

title: DAMIEN
role: ZOOM IN on Jesus who suddenly realizes what this all means.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Standing up) So it was written... And so the cycle of years brings the son of the evil one...

title: DAMIEN
text: (To Kyle) Oh brother, now HE'S talking like the new kid.

title: DAMIEN
text: Thou must taketh me to the seedling of Satan so mine eyes can confirm the wretched truth.

title: DAMIEN
text: Kay.

title: DAMIEN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK ELEMENTARY - PLAYGROUND - DAY

title: DAMIEN
role: A recess monitor blows her whistle as kids run around the
text: playground.

title: DAMIEN
text: Five minutes until recess is over you little bastards!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman is standing by the swingset with full on graphs,
text: charts and drawings. A few random kids are gathered around.

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman has a pointer in his hand and is using it to
text: demonstrate as he talks.

title: DAMIEN
text: Now, as you can see, the Red Mega- Man uses the -- (Pointing) Mega Cycle, which is what Clyde will be getting me for my birthday. Wendy, YOU were supposed to get me the Mega Power Chopper illustrated -- (Pointing) HERE. But I am changing your present to the Yellow Mega-Man, since Kenny has been turned into a -- (Pointing) duck billed platypus. That means that the Mega-Man Beach House, illustrated here... Will be a gift given by two people at once...

title: DAMIEN
role: The kids all try to follow along with their eyes. A few take
text: notes.

title: DAMIEN
role: EXT. ANOTHER PART OF THE PLAYGROUND

title: DAMIEN
role: Meanwhile, Damien is at another part of the playground setting
text: things on fire with his hands. Pip is standing next to him.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien spins around and burns down the slide. Several children
text: look sad.

title: DAMIEN
text: Our slide!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien spins around and sets the teeter-totter a blaze. Again
text: the children look sad.

title: DAMIEN
text: FEEL MY WRATH!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh dear, you shouldn't be so upset, Damien. I know its hard being the new kid, but the children may accept you some day.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Insincere) I DON'T NEED ACCEPTANCE! I'M THE SON OF SATAN!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Another flick of the hand, and Damien burns down the little
text: spring-animals.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien turns and burns down the jungle gym.

title: DAMIEN
text: Believe me, I know what its like not to have friends. Perhaps you should speak to the school counselor, he helps me a lot when I'm feeling lonely.

title: DAMIEN
text: DAMIEN!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien turns around and sees Jesus standing with Stan and
text: Kyle and the Kenny duck billed platypus.

title: DAMIEN
text: AH! Son of Stench!! Cursed ruler of the weak!!

title: DAMIEN
text: So it IS Thou! Son of Lucifer!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Your time on this Earth is short!! Soon my father comes!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Cartman follow the biblical exchange
text: like a tennis match with their heads.

title: DAMIEN
text: Let him come then! I shall stop him!

title: DAMIEN
text: Behold! He is already upon us!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Suddenly, clouds move all over the sky. The day becomes black.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, dude!

title: DAMIEN
role: A huge booming voice comes from all around.

title: DAMIEN
text: Et dominous em pluribus unom som...

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien closes his eyes and listens. Jesus looks around,
text: confused.

title: DAMIEN
text: Forente omi sanctum san ri en unibus.

title: DAMIEN
role: Winds blow, thing fly all around. Half the townspeople come
text: running up to see what's happening.

title: DAMIEN
text: What the hell is going on?!

title: DAMIEN
role: Now a normal looking priest, (we call him PRIEST MAXI) walks
text: up and looks around.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Pointing to Jesus) Look! It's that guy from the public access show!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus looks around the flying debris. Chef comes running up
text: as well.

title: DAMIEN
text: WHAT'S HAPPENING?!

title: DAMIEN
text: (To the pretty women) Come over here if you're scared, womens! I'll protect you!

title: DAMIEN
role: Mr. Garrison hides in Chef's bosom.

title: DAMIEN
text: Not, you dammit!

title: DAMIEN
text: En ri... En ri omnibus spiritus...

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus... My father says... He CHOOSES YOU! He CALLS YOU OUT!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus eyes grow wide. All the townspeople look at each other.

title: DAMIEN
text: Be here at this time tomorrow! There the terms will be discussed!

title: DAMIEN
text: Very well! Let the final battle between good and evil be fought... Right here in South Park!

title: DAMIEN
text: Come on Ned! We gotta get our asses to the bookie!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Everyone disperses. Stan and Kyle walks up next to Jesus.

title: DAMIEN
text: You're gonna fight Satan?

title: DAMIEN
text: This fight has been ordained since the beginning. My children, this is the most crucial and serious time of all history...

title: DAMIEN
role: An ad is playing on the television.

title: DAMIEN
text: Who will win our souls? Our savior and Lord? Or the Prince of Darkness!

title: DAMIEN
role: SERIOUS MUSIC plays as strange images fly past the screen.

title: DAMIEN
text: It's the Final Battle between good and evil. AND IT'S ONLY ON PAY PER VIEW!!

title: DAMIEN
role: TITLES fly into frame 'JESUS VS. SATAN'

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus verses Satan! Live from the South Park Forum on Saturday! Call now to order, only $49.95!

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Duck Billed Kenny are watching T.V.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey, wait a minute! Saturday is my birthday party! They can't have the fight on Saturday!

title: DAMIEN
text: Mwack, mwack!

title: DAMIEN
text: I don't know what to do, dude. Do we go to the fight or Cartman's birthday?

title: DAMIEN
text: Cartman's birthday!

title: DAMIEN
text: We can't miss the final apocalyptic battle between good and evil.

title: DAMIEN
text: You guys! My mom's getting a ferris wheel!

title: DAMIEN
text: Well, come on, we have to at least see the weigh in.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan, Kyle and Kenny head out.

title: DAMIEN
text: WHO THE HELL DECIDED THIS FIGHT HAD TO BE ON SATURDAY HUH?!! THIS WHOLE THING IS A PLOT AGAINST ME, ISN'T IT!!

title: DAMIEN
role: A large group of people have gathered around Jesus in downtown
text: South Park.

title: DAMIEN
text: When is Satan going to show up?

title: DAMIEN
role: Another Townsperson shrugs as he prepares his camera by
text: cleaning off the lens.

title: DAMIEN
text: Did The Devil show up yet?

title: DAMIEN
text: Not yet.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey Jesus, If you win the fight can you turn Kenny back to normal?

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus looks at the little duck billed platypus.

title: DAMIEN
text: What the hell do you mean IF I win the fight?

title: DAMIEN
text: (Aside) Don't mind him, Jesus. He's Jewish.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Understanding) Oh.

title: DAMIEN
text: We're all with you Jesus! We put every dime we have on you beating that Dark Prince!

title: DAMIEN
text: Thank you for your faith. But I think perhaps you don't understand the severity of the situation...

title: DAMIEN
text: You're gonna kick his ass, Jesus!

title: DAMIEN
role: The Townspeople all cheer again. Suddenly, a HUGE booming
text: sound starts.

title: DAMIEN
text: Behold, the evil one approaches.

title: DAMIEN
role: In walks Satan. Seven feet two inches, three hundred and ten
text: pounds -- A BIG, BAD ASS MOTHER FUCKER.

title: DAMIEN
role: The Townspeople's jaws all drop in unison.

title: DAMIEN
text: Holy poop on a stick!

title: DAMIEN
text: (Deep, bellowing voice) Puny son of Jehovah. Prepare to enter thy house of pain.

title: DAMIEN
text: Holy crap, dude, Satan is HUGE!

title: DAMIEN
text: Now that is a man who has eaten a lot of beef.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus tries to look tough, but he's obviously scared. Stan
text: and Kyle look at each other with deep concern.

title: DAMIEN
role: Everybody is still gathered around for the weigh in. Satan
text: stands in front of Jesus looking tough and confident.

title: DAMIEN
text: Son of God, I will smash thy face into small little bits.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus swallows hard, then tries desperately not to sound
text: scared.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh... Oh yeah?

title: DAMIEN
text: I have such delightful horrors to unleash upon thee.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh yeah?

title: DAMIEN
role: The Townspeople look at each other, concerned. The Weigh In
text: Guy stands with a large scale. He gestures for Satan to step up, and he does.

title: DAMIEN
text: Satan weighs in at... Three Hundred and Twenty pounds four ounces!

title: DAMIEN
role: The townspeople all gasp. Jesus replaces Satan on the scale.

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus Christ weighs in at... A hundred and thirty-five pounds -- one ounce!

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan and Kyle look at each other.

title: DAMIEN
text: Ooh, crap.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Checking the scale) Oh come on, I weigh more than that!

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan throws his arms in the air.

title: DAMIEN
text: LET THE NEW PRINCE BE DECIDED ON SATURDAY!! FIRST SOUTH PARK, THEN THE WORLD!!!!!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan leaves. Jesus stands there, still obviously shaken.

title: DAMIEN
role: The Townspeople look around, with knowing nods.

title: DAMIEN
text: Well... I think I'll uh... I think I left the oven on...

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah... I think I left your oven on, too...

title: DAMIEN
role: All the Townspeople slowly back away. Jesus looks at them
text: suspiciously.

title: DAMIEN
text: See ya, Saturday, Jesus. Good Luck...

title: DAMIEN
role: The townspeople suddenly burst through the doors and storm
text: the bookie.

title: DAMIEN
text: I want to change my bet to Satan!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Me too!!

title: DAMIEN
text: I was here first!

title: DAMIEN
role: A wiry, dorky man sits at a desk with his hands folded. A
text: sign on the desk tells us very clearly that this is the SCHOOL COUNSELOR.

title: DAMIEN
text: Now, as your counselor, I want you to feel like you can tell me ANYTHING OK?... Being the new kid can be tough, but I'm your friend Okay.

title: DAMIEN
role: Sitting across from the counselor is little Damien, actually
text: looking a little bummed for the first time.

title: DAMIEN
text: Everybody hates me.

title: DAMIEN
text: Well... Why do you suppose that is?

title: DAMIEN
text: (Thinking) Because I'm the son of the devil?

title: DAMIEN
text: Uh-huh. That's a good start. Why else?

title: DAMIEN
text: (Thinking) Because I burn them and kill them?

title: DAMIEN
text: Well, yes, maybe that's it... What you need to do Damien is to be overly nice. No matter how mean the other kids are to you, just don't retaliate.

title: DAMIEN
text: Be passive, Okay? that's what I taught the little British boy, Pip, and just look at how much the other children like him now!

title: DAMIEN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK ELEMENTARY - PLAYGROUND - DAY

title: DAMIEN
role: A few children are standing in a circle with Pip in the
text: middle.

title: DAMIEN
text: I bet I can spit the most on him!

title: DAMIEN
role: Clyde let's a loogie go on Pip.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh yeah, I bet I can get spit in his hair!

title: DAMIEN
role: Bebe spits a wod in Pip's eye.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, nice try! A little higher and you've got it.

title: DAMIEN
role: At another part of the playground, the boys are all just
text: standing around, since all the playground equipment was burned down by Damien.

title: DAMIEN
text: Man, recess sucks without any slides or nothin'.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, here comes unholy butthole now.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey! Thanks a lot for burning everything down, you little bitch!

title: DAMIEN
text: I apologize for ruining your playground and turning your friend into a duck billed platypus. I was doing my father's bidding. I didn't have a choice.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, oh!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman walks up to Damien and farts on him.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, excuse me, new kid! I didn't mean to fart on you, I didn't have a choice!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien looks pissed, but he holds back.

title: DAMIEN
text: Whew! You stink new kid! You smell like a fart!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, we're gonna call you fart boy from now on!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien walks off, pissed off and sad.

title: DAMIEN
text: Bye Bye, Fart boy!

title: DAMIEN
text: See ya!

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien leaves and walks up to Pip.

title: DAMIEN
text: Good day. How are you, Damien?

title: DAMIEN
text: Those guys farted on me and then called me --

title: DAMIEN
text: Fart boy? Oh good, perhaps they won't call ME that any more!

title: DAMIEN
role: The Townspeople are all sitting around tables, drinking beer
text: and conversing.

title: DAMIEN
role: Suddenly, Jesus walks in through the front door looking very
text: upset.

title: DAMIEN
text: Excuse me!

title: DAMIEN
text: (Pissed) I just talked to the BOOKIE at the sports BETTING bar...

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, oh...

title: DAMIEN
role: The townspeople all look around and whistle.

title: DAMIEN
text: I HAVE BEEN FORSAKEN!! It seems that several bets were changed to Satan this morning!

title: DAMIEN
role: The townspeople look at each other.

title: DAMIEN
text: In fact, it seems that only ONE PERSON in this ENTIRE TOWN is still betting on me!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jimbo looks at the townspeople with disapproval.

title: DAMIEN
text: You should all be ashamed of yourselves! Betting against your Lord and savior! I am disgusted!

title: DAMIEN
text: YOUR bet was changed as well. YOU Forsaked me too!

title: DAMIEN
text: Uh, right... Well, he does have a couple hundred pounds on you, Jesus.

title: DAMIEN
text: I implore you all -- Don't bet on the Dark one! It is a bet that you will NEVER win!

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus, I am sorry I have sinned against you. I am gonna march right over to that bookie and change my bet RIGHT NOW!

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh Yeah, me too!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah!

title: DAMIEN
text: Praise the Lord. Thank you sweet Jesus for showing us the light, See ya later!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus pauses, then again looks suspicious and walks out. As
text: soon as the door closes, everybody immediately sits back and starts drinking again.

title: DAMIEN
text: What the hell, does he think we're crazy?

title: DAMIEN
role: Everybody laughs. Jesus pops back in.

title: DAMIEN
text: You're all a bunch of Judases!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus walks out of the bar huffingly and bumps into the boys.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey, Jesus.

title: DAMIEN
text: What are you doing out so late, kids?

title: DAMIEN
text: We have to find red and green mega- mans for Cartman's birthday party.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh... (thinking) Kids... YOU believe I can beat Satan, right?

title: DAMIEN
text: Sure, dude, you're the son of God.

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah. You aren't having doubts are you?

title: DAMIEN
text: No, no... (Pause) But could you help me train a little?

title: DAMIEN
role: Several cameras are surrounding a table where Satan is sitting
text: behind a plethora of microphones.

title: DAMIEN
text: Satan, what do you expect the outcome of the fight to be?

title: DAMIEN
text: I will crush him like a little bug.

title: DAMIEN
text: Satan, what about the rumors of your involvement in the Gulf War?

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan starts to speak, but suddenly a hand jumps in and covers
text: up the microphone.

title: DAMIEN
role: WHIP PAN RIGHT to reveal DON KING sitting next to Satan.

title: DAMIEN
text: Let's focus on the fight, can we please? I'm so sick of people talking smack about my fighters. All this 'He's mean', 'He's a dirty fighter', 'He the cause for all violence and death in the world', it's just getting old. Let's just let everything be decided in the ring.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus is wearing large boxing gloves, and punching a bag
text: that Stan and Kyle are holding.

title: DAMIEN
text: You guys, shouldn't you be out shopping for my birthday presents?

title: DAMIEN
text: (Ignoring him) Here, Jesus, drink these raw eggs.

title: DAMIEN
text: No way, dude.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus steps into the little ring. Chef is standing there
text: with boxing gloves.

title: DAMIEN
text: I can't... I can't hit Jesus Christ. My mother would never speak to me again.

title: DAMIEN
text: But you're his sparring partner, Chef.

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, you have to hit him.

title: DAMIEN
text: Satan must be defeated, Chef. Please help me to train.

title: DAMIEN
text: Okay, but I'm just gonna tap you, alright?

title: DAMIEN
text: Give it your best sho --

title: DAMIEN
role: SLAM!!!! Chef punches Jesus in the face, and Jesus flies to
text: the canvas.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, God in Heaven!! What have I done?!?

title: DAMIEN
text: Oof... Anybody get the number of that truck?

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman's birthday party is an AMAZING event. There are
text: elephants, clowns, mimes, and even a ferris wheel.

title: DAMIEN
role: A large Banner reads 'Happy Birthday, Eric!'

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman's mother walks through the huge crowd of kids,
text: carrying an ENORMOUS amount of food.

title: DAMIEN
text: Come on, kiddies! Eat more!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman is walking tall, wearing a little pointed birthday
text: hat. He greets children as they walk in.

title: DAMIEN
text: Welcome, Clyde. Please put your present on the table to your left... Welcome, Bebe, presents go to your left... Welcome Chef...

title: DAMIEN
text: Yup, here's your present, children. Well, nice party, see you later.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey, you just got here, Chef!

title: DAMIEN
text: I know, but the fight is starting!

title: DAMIEN
text: But dude, check it out, Cartman's mom made chili.

title: DAMIEN
role: Mrs. Cartman gives Chef a wink.

title: DAMIEN
text: Mmmm, that's my favorite kind of chili.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien and Pip are sitting alone on the curb.

title: DAMIEN
text: I guess all the kids are at that fat boy's birthday party.

title: DAMIEN
text: Yes... It's always such a huge event. Sometimes I like to sneak up to the fence and close my eyes, and pretend I'm there.

title: DAMIEN
text: The other kids have ALWAYS hated you?

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, yes. Actually, I think they make fun of the fat boy a lot too, but now I think they like him because he picks on me.

title: DAMIEN
role: A good sized place for a boxing match.

title: DAMIEN
role: The arena is huge. Just like the ring at Ceasar's or MGM.

title: DAMIEN
role: Banners and decorative posters are everywhere.

title: DAMIEN
text: In the blue corner, wearing white trunks, weighing in at a mere one hundred and forty pounds -- Jesus El Saviorrrrrrrrrrr CHRIST!!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: And in the very very black corner, wearing very very black trunks, the King of all that is evil, BEEEEEEE EL ZEBUB!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: The crowd cheers. Jesus shoots them all a dirty look. They
text: stop.

title: DAMIEN
text: Ladies & Gentlemen. LLLLLLLLLLLet's get ready to RUMMMMMBLLLLLE!!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus and Satan meet in the center of the ring. The little
text: bald ref steps between them.

title: DAMIEN
text: Okay, I want a good, clean fight guys, no punches below the belt, holding or miracles.

title: DAMIEN
role: The bell rings. Jesus and Satan go to their corners.

title: DAMIEN
role: The big birthday party continues. Boys and girls run around
text: and play and laugh.

title: DAMIEN
role: Suddenly, Damien and Pip walk in.

title: DAMIEN
text: HEY! What the hell do you think you're doing here?!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, YOU aren't invited, new kid!

title: DAMIEN
text: And neither are YOU, PIP!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yes, I tried to tell Damien that we weren't invited, but --

title: DAMIEN
text: Wait a minute, give me a chance! I want to do something special for your party...

title: DAMIEN
role: Just then, Damien touches Pip -- and something incredible
text: happens. Demons come up from the ground and grab onto Pip.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh NOOOO!!!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: The demons hoist Pip up into the air. Pip's clothes catch on
text: fire. He screams horrifically.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow!

title: DAMIEN
role: Pip's body flies up into the sky and PWOOF!!! An explosion
text: like beautiful fireworks illuminate the party.

title: DAMIEN
role: The kids all cheer and applaud.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow, that was COOL!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey... You're not such a bad guy after all, Damien!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, come on in and join the party!

title: DAMIEN
role: The bell rings! Jesus and Satan come from their corners.

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan immediately throws a punch that connects and knocks
text: Jesus back.

title: DAMIEN
role: The crowd all goes wild! Jesus turns and looks at them in
text: disgust. The crowd just as immediately gets quiet.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus takes another couple of blows to the body. The punches
text: are hard and painful. Jesus looks incredibly sad and scared.

title: DAMIEN
role: Now Jesus drops his arms and just let's Satan pound on him.

title: DAMIEN
text: Come on you little wuss! FIGHT!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Throw a punch!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman is wearing a little birthday hat on his head and
text: standing at a table opening gifts.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, I wonder what Stan got me for my birthday... Oh look! A blue Mega- Man!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman pulls out the toy and smiles.

title: DAMIEN
text: Thank you, Stan, you may eat pie and cake and ice cream, now.

title: DAMIEN
text: And what did Wendy get me? (Before he even opens it) Oh, it's The Yellow Mega-Man!

title: DAMIEN
role: Now Cartman opens the present and sure enough, The Yellow
text: Mega Man is inside.

title: DAMIEN
text: Help yourself to pie, cake and ice cream, Wendy.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh! Look what Kyle got me! it's a Red Mega -- (Opening the gift) Ants in the Pants?!

title: DAMIEN
text: ANTS IN THE PANTS?! ANTS IN THE PANTS?!

title: DAMIEN
text: It's a game, dude. It's really fun.

title: DAMIEN
text: YOU SON OF A BITCH!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman tackles Kyle and knocks him to the ground.

title: DAMIEN
text: AAGHGH!!

title: DAMIEN
text: YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO GET ME THE RED MEGA MAN!!! NOW I CAN'T MAKE ULTRA MEGA-MEGA MAN!! YOU DIRTY CHEAP ASS PIECE OF CRAP!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: THEY WERE ALL OUT OF 'EM, DUDE!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: I HATE YOU!!! I WANT YOU TO DIE!!!! DIE!!!!!!!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman suddenly gets up and yells to everybody.

title: DAMIEN
text: THAT'S IT!! PARTY IS OVER!!! EVERYBODY GO HOME!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: The kids all look stunned. Cartman walks over to a HUGE switch
text: and pulls it down. Immediately the entire party shuts down -- The ferris wheel stops, the lights go off and all the music stops.

title: DAMIEN
text: GET THE HELL OUT I SAID!! PARTY'S OVER!!! GET OUT GODAMNIT!!

title: DAMIEN
role: The kids all start to file out.

title: DAMIEN
text: (Walking out) Whoa dude, you need to mellow out.

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman throws the box at Kyle.

title: DAMIEN
text: Take you stupid ants in the pants with you!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: All the kids are gathered outside, in shock.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow, that kid has some real emotional problems.

title: DAMIEN
text: Aw, he does this all the time.

title: DAMIEN
role: Chef starts running down the street.

title: DAMIEN
text: Come on, children!! We can still catch the end of the fight!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Pip drops out of the sky.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh, what a splendid party.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus is still getting his ass kicked by Satan. Satan is
text: dancing around, landing blows. Jesus still won't fight.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus takes a smack to the face.

title: DAMIEN
text: Fight Dammit!

title: DAMIEN
role: The boys run up to Jesus' corner.

title: DAMIEN
text: Dude, Jesus is getting his butt kicked!

title: DAMIEN
role: Just then, the bell rings. Jesus returns to his corner and
text: plops down in his seat.

title: DAMIEN
text: You've got to FIGHT, Jesus!

title: DAMIEN
text: Why? What's the point? No one believes in me. Everyone put their money on Satan... My Father forsaked me... The Town forsaked me... I'm completely forsook.

title: DAMIEN
text: SOMEBODY bet on you, Jesus. You said yourself that one person still has money on you.

title: DAMIEN
text: It doesn't matter. He's way to strong for me anyway. I give up.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan gets in Jesus' face and starts yelling.

title: DAMIEN
text: GOD DAMMIT, JESUS SNAP OUT OF IT!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: What would Nancy Karrigan do?! HUH?! Nancy Karrigan wouldn't give up!! When things were looking their darkest Nancy Karrigan fought to be the BEST!!

title: DAMIEN
text: She wouldn't stop until she was NUMBER ONE!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Uh... Stan...

title: DAMIEN
text: Nancy Karrigan wouldn't settle for second best!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Stan...

title: DAMIEN
text: She wouldn't quit until she brought home the gold!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Stan!!

title: DAMIEN
text: What?!

title: DAMIEN
text: Nancy Karrigan got the silver, dude. She came in second.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan thinks for a long time.

title: DAMIEN
text: Really?

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, dude.

title: DAMIEN
text: Oh... Never mind Jesus, Nancy Karrigan sucks.

title: DAMIEN
role: The snapping sounds means it's almost time to go back into
text: the ring. Jesus drinks some water and spits it out.

title: DAMIEN
role: Now Stan gets right in Jesus' face.

title: DAMIEN
text: You know... Somebody once said 'Don't try to be a great man, just be a man'.

title: DAMIEN
text: Who said that?

title: DAMIEN
text: YOU did Jesus.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan puts his hand on Jesus' shoulder. MUSIC swells up. Jesus
text: gives a little smile and nods.

title: DAMIEN
text: You're right, Stan.

title: DAMIEN
text: Thank you, boys.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow, did he say that in the bible?

title: DAMIEN
text: No, I saw it on Star Trek.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hmmn.

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus and Satan meet in the ring.

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan takes a couple of shots, Jesus ducks, and the punches
text: miss.

title: DAMIEN
text: Come on you SISSY! Hit me! Hit me!

title: DAMIEN
text: Okay, pal, YOU ASKED FOR IT!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jesus winds up his arm. Stan and Kyle watch intensely. The
text: Townspeople's eyes get wide...

title: DAMIEN
role: Finally, Jesus delivers the blow -- He hits Satan EXTREMELY
text: SOFTLY in the arm. Satan doesn't even flinch.

title: DAMIEN
role: Stan and Kyle roll their eyes.

title: DAMIEN
role: But suddenly, Satan grabs his arm --

title: DAMIEN
text: AAAGHH!! YOU GOT ME!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan falls to the canvas, eyes closed.

title: DAMIEN
text: ONE! TWO! THREE! FOUR!

title: DAMIEN
text: No way! He barely touched him!

title: DAMIEN
text: FIVE! SIX! SEVEN! EIGHT!

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan opens one eye, but doesn't move from the canvas, a
text: little smile crosses his face.

title: DAMIEN
text: NINE! TEN! YOU'RE OUT!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: The bell rings over and over. Jesus throws his hands in the
text: air and jumps up and down.

title: DAMIEN
text: OUR SAVIOR!!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: The winner by knockout and still undisputed ruler of your spiritual kingdom. Jesus Elllllll Saaaavior Christ.

title: DAMIEN
role: Just then, Satan gets up, looking just fine.

title: DAMIEN
text: Hey! He isn't hurt! He took a dive! He threw the fight!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah.

title: DAMIEN
text: Fools!! You are all fools! Of course I took a dive! Don't you see -- who do you think was the ONE PERSON that bet on Jesus to win?

title: DAMIEN
text: ME you idiots!! And now I will take all your hard earned money and return to hell a MUCH RICHER Prince of Darkness and buy some real estate! Ha HA HA!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Satan dances out of the ring.

title: DAMIEN
text: I don't believe this!

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, what a mean thing to do!

title: DAMIEN
text: Farewell fools!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Man... That guy is a JERK!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus TOLD you guys not to bet on Satan!

title: DAMIEN
text: Boy, did we get screwed.

title: DAMIEN
text: Jesus, we're sorry... Can you ever forgive us?

title: DAMIEN
text: Aw, heck, do I have a choice?

title: DAMIEN
text: Well Jesus, I definitely learned MY lesson. Never bet on evil, because when you do -- Ned, look! That's a rare duck billed platypus! It's comin' right for us!!!

title: DAMIEN
role: Jimbo pulls out a gun and blows Kenny's head off.

title: DAMIEN
text: OH MY GOD!! THEY KILLED KENNY!!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: You bastard!!!

title: DAMIEN
text: Well, goodbye guys, it was nice getting to know you.

title: DAMIEN
text: You're leaving already?

title: DAMIEN
text: I have to. My dad's always on the move.

title: DAMIEN
role: Damien hangs his head and walks away.

title: DAMIEN
text: Wow... I feel kinda bad for that kid.

title: DAMIEN
text: Yeah, just when he was being accepted he has to leave and start over.

title: DAMIEN
text: Parents can be so cruel. Don't they realize that what a child needs more than anything is security?

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman is sitting at a table by himself surrounded by half
text: eaten cakes, pies, and all kinds of other crap. Food is all over the place.

title: DAMIEN
role: Cartman's face is covered with food, his eyes are half closed.
text: It looks like a food war has been fought, but actually Cartman has just gorged himself.

title: DAMIEN
text: More pie, hon?

title: DAMIEN
text: (Weakly) No... more... pie...
